Key Match Events: Jon Singleton added a two-run shot
Yuli Gurriel singled to left, Melendez scored, Fermin to third
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 4th game of the series between the Royals and Astros, with the Astros winning all 4 games
Others: The game was played at Daikin Park in Houston, Texas, with an attendance of 40,229
